name: Hooverman - and the cluttered room of various items
name_original: Hooverman - and the cluttered room of various items
description:
Welcome to Hooverman! Your job is to clean up a nursery room full of all sorts of various items. Can you do it in the limited amount of time that you have, or will you be fired? The task is up to you

This is a game made for the Side Quest #4 game jam featuring Mediatonic, and was made in less than a week.

Controlls for the game:

WASD - move around

RMB - collect using the vacuum cleaner

LMB - shoot stuff out

Q / E - rotate camera

Credits to:

MintArcade - art and visuals
